sense.def: Alternative Names xiang ruan 項 軟 , soft nape. Pathological Condition of children having a weak neck after having been sick, their head falling to one side, and an inability to keep it upright. You you xin shu 幼幼新書 26 ：漢東王先生《家寶》治 小兒久患疳疾，體虛，久不進飲食，患來日久，諸候退，只是天柱骨倒 , “Mr. Wang from Handong in his Jia bao cured a child suffering from the ailment of gan -illness. Its body was weak and it could not ingest beverages and food for a long time. After the suffering had continued for an extended period of time, all [disease] signs vanished, except for a celestial pillar bone inversion ”.
